==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|ic}} - a tied bag ([[𣒚]]), with various items in it ([[𤕦]]). 𤕦 also serves as a phonetic element. There are many alternative forms. In the modern, standard form, the bottom turned into [[襄]]. Etymology best preserved in small seal script form.
